name: CloseContact
description:
Game Developed for PIMA Game Design Spring Class of 2021 Game Jam 01.

-Movement-

WASD

-Goal of this Game-

Make contact with the Aliens that helped you escape prison while avoiding the police.

Length of game jam: 2 weeks.

Designer comments: This is my first attempt at using unity as well as making a game so sorry if it's not AAA quality! 

Missing features: No sound, Main Menu, fail screen and win screen.

Custom assets developed in Adobe Illustrator: Main Character, Police Officer, Police Station, Random House, Parking Spaces, "Game Place" & sign.

Unity Playgrounds Assets: Nature assets, Keys / Flags, Aliens, Streets.
